title: Instagram enables product tags for everyone, committed to rank original content better
content:
Today, Adam Mosseri, head of Instagram, announced three new changes being made available on the platform. According to Mosseri, the company is focusing on new ways to tag brands and products to rank original content better.

description: Adam Mosseri, head of Instagram, announced three new changes being made available on the platform. Here are them.
